import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { Container, Row, Col, Jumbotron, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../css/home1.css' import Navbar from '../components/navbar.js' import Chat from './chat.js' import socket from './connect.js' function Home1(history){ const nameLog = history.location.state.login //console.log(a) const [chat, setChat] = useState({ message: '', name: a}) const onMessageSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const { name, message } = chat socket.emit('message', { name, message}) setChat({ message: '', name}) } const onTextChange = e => { setChat({ ...chat, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return(

Channel

{chat.name} dit : onTextChange(e)}/>

List connected
) } export default Home1
